tool_description: Optimizes transmitter site locations to maximize coverage area, minimize interference, and meet service requirements using geographic and RF constraints.

service_area_bounds.description: Service area boundary as [min_lat, max_lat, min_lon, max_lon]

population_density_points.description: High-priority coverage locations as lat,lon coordinate pairs

existing_sites.description: Existing transmitter sites as lat,lon pairs to avoid interference

max_sites.description: Maximum number of sites to place (1 to 50)

min_site_separation_km.description: Minimum separation between sites in kilometers

coverage_threshold_dbm.description: Minimum signal strength requirement in dBm

error_messages: Invalid service area bounds: Must provide [min_lat, max_lat, min_lon, max_lon] with valid coordinates.
Invalid population points: Coordinate pairs must be valid lat,lon within service area.
Invalid existing sites: Site coordinates must be valid lat,lon format.
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be within supported range (30 to 30000 MHz).
Invalid site count: Must request between 1 and 50 sites.
Invalid site separation: Minimum separation must be positive (0.1 to 100 km).
Invalid coverage threshold: Threshold must be reasonable signal level (-150 to -50 dBm).
Invalid terrain factor: Penalty factor must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Service area too large: Requested area exceeds optimization capabilities.
usage: Define service area boundaries and priority coverage points. Specify frequency, maximum sites, and constraints. The tool finds optimal site locations for maximum coverage efficiency.

optimized_sites.description: Optimal site locations as lat,lon coordinate pairs

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of priority points achieving coverage threshold

total_coverage_area_km2.description: Total coverage area achieved in square kilometers

site_priorities.description: Priority ranking of each recommended site
